name: unity-lab-ai-website
description: Unity AI Lab - Official website with AI demos, libraries, and tools

scripts.build: node generate-sitemap.js && vite build && node copy-assets.js && node cache-bust.js
scripts.minify: npx terser js/init.js -c -m -o script.min.js && npx cleancss -o styles.min.css styles.css

author: Unity AI Lab - Hackall360, Sponge, GFourteen
